title: Haruto Has Two Types of Cones

content.question: Haruto’s eyes have only two types of cones. Which of the following of Haruto’s perceptual abilities is most likely to be affected by this?

choices.label: Choosing clothing of a particular color
Determining distances between objects as he reaches for them
Focusing on objects that are close

content.answer: Choosing clothing of a particular color

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
